document.full_text: a group of mothers demanding justice for those who died during the tiananmen square massacre said tuesday that police officials in beijing had contacted one family in april to discuss compensation.
document.title: asia: china: tiananmen payment discussed, activists say
lines_and_colors: a group of mothers demanding justice for those who died during the tiananmen square massacre said tuesday that police officials in beijing had contacted one family in april to discuss compensation.
